# Copilot Instructions for Jukebox

This repository contains the Party Jukebox application.

## Project Overview

Jukebox is a party jukebox application that allows users to manage and play music.

## Code Style and Conventions

- Write clean, readable, and maintainable code
- Follow established patterns already present in the codebase
- Include appropriate error handling
- Add comments for complex logic

## Testing

- Write tests for new functionality
- Ensure existing tests pass before submitting changes
- Follow the existing test patterns in the repository

## Documentation

- Update documentation when making changes to public APIs or features
- Keep the README.md up to date with any significant changes

## Pull Requests

- Keep changes focused and minimal
- Write clear commit messages
- Ensure all tests pass before requesting review
